item.title: rafaela
item.description: × RAFAELA HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ Rafaela is an angel capable of miraculously healing anything. It is said that when she appears, all pain suddenly vanishes, all wounds instantly heal, and all evil disperses like rain clouds when the sun comes out. Now Rafaela has descended upon the Land of Dawn in the hopes of using her miraculous powers to restore peace to the land. RAFAELA MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Supports Lane: ROAM Tier : S Tier BP : 6500 DM : 254 Ticket : 0 rafaela × @ Close More Info Hero skills Rafaela Skills 1 × Deity Penalization
